Text:
@FaMoUz ... as it says in the torrent title, this torrent also contains the 2x00 origin special (which is basically just a recap of season 1).

And no one seems to have capped the Revelations S2 finale special which was after 2x12 and featured the cast talking about what happened in the finale.

Sorry... I hit send on that previous by mistake....  was not quite what I intended to send. Meant to just point out the extra was just a recap and ask about revelations. *shouldn't post when I'm tired*
i was also wondering where the extra episode revelations is i would really like to see it but cannot find it on tpb anywhere
